text: 6.33: 1 Kin 3.13-14; Sng 37.4; 37.25; Ro 14.17Nde fhara muunga tɨv khare. Nde Fhe Bakɨme piin kɨrim, ana ŋgui vhɨrve guman pana farar muuŋgip, nde gari guman pan kɨrim, nde ana tɨvar vhuuŋ zɨn ŋgɨri. Nde ana tɨva vhuuŋ zɨn ŋgɨrim, ana vhɨra mba harigi bigi, ana vhɨra nta phorgɨp nde nɨɨŋgirga.
